div.p: Coefficients are standardized. Ninety-five percent CIs were derived using 1,000 bootstrap samples ( n = 1,263). Global warming (GW) beliefs (happening and human-caused) and worry autocorrelations are depicted below the figure to preserve legibility. ** P < 0.01; *** P < 0.001. T1, time 1; T2, time 2; RMSEA, root mean square error of approximation; CFI, comparative fit index; AIC, Akaike information criterion; BIC, Bayesian information criterion.
